Package infpp.streetlife.view

Class StreetLifeView

  • java.lang.Object
    • infpp.streetlife.view.StreetLifeView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    View
    public class StreetLifeView
extends java.lang.Object
implements View
    The StreetLifeView implements the interface, manages the in/outputs and controls the gui. Basically used for connecting the gui to the view-interface
    Since:
    2022-01-28
    Version:
    1.4
    Author:
    Cornelius
